channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Retail Customer Management and Segmentation Foundation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Retail Customer Management and Segmentation Foundation

item.title: CVE-2020-2953|2024-09-27T18:46:23.091Z -- oracle%20corporation -- retail%20customer%20management%20and%20segmentation%20foundation
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Retail Customer Management and Segmentation Foundation product of Oracle Retail Applications (component: Promotions). The supported version that is affected is 18.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Retail Customer Management and Segmentation Foundation. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle Retail Customer Management and Segmentation Foundation. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.8 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
